title: Yorick
body:
Just played my first EVER game of Yorick after unlocking him through hextech crafting.

He's got to be one of the most boring/unfulfilling champions in the game. He's the Soraka of Top lane
Can't believe he hasn't been reworked, but Ryze gets one every 10 months.

{{champion:83}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
He's getting a rework, Sion level at that.

I just hope they release another Pentakill album along side his rework.
They probably will release a Hexakill skin when hexakill comes out again.
